name: part_007
file: tmp_【#癒月ちょこ生誕祭2024】‐ GotCheat‐コラボ者多数！重大告知あり！3DBirthdayLIVE!!!【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [5rns6j2eHcQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Choco and Tomoe talk after their performance, praising each other's singing and expressing joy about the 3D collaboration.
Choco asks Tomoe for a birthday favor, and Tomoe jokingly offers to lick her shoes before they agree to take a photo together.
The two prepare for photos, discussing their models' sexiness and cute points while deciding on a pose.
They discuss their height difference, with Tomoe being much taller, and then take a back-to-back photo.
Screenshot time for the audience. They pose with their arms up, commenting on the 'Big Bang' of their combined bust sizes.
They move to the floor for a sitting pose, looking like an angel and a devil together.
Tomoe gives her final greetings and congratulations to Choco before leaving to watch the rest of the show from the audience.

subtitles.original: すごくて、あの、特に
subtitles.english: It was amazing, and especially...

subtitles.original: ちょっと語っていいですか？あの...
subtitles.english: Can I talk about it for a bit? Um...

subtitles.original: チョコ先生が、もう、私と全然違う歌い方をされたので。
subtitles.english: Because Choco-sensei, you sang it so differently from me.

subtitles.original: あ、すごい！と思って。
subtitles.english: I thought, "Ah, that's incredible!"

subtitles.original: エッチく歌っちゃった。他にもね、そう。
subtitles.english: I sang it a bit sexily. And there was also...

subtitles.original: あ、もうありがとうございます。チョコ先生バージョンも聴けて。
subtitles.english: Ah, thank you so much. Being able to hear Choco-sensei's version...

subtitles.original: 一緒に、しかもお披露目できて、嬉しいです。ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: ...and perform it together for the unveiling, I'm so happy. Thank you.

subtitles.original: いや、こちらこそありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: No, the pleasure is all mine. Thank you.

subtitles.original: え、じゃあさ、じゃあさ、
subtitles.english: Um, so, you know,

subtitles.original: チョコ、お誕生日だから、
subtitles.english: since it's Choco's birthday,

subtitles.original: チョコのお願い聞いてくれる？
subtitles.english: would you listen to Choco's favor?

subtitles.original: あ、何です？何でもしますよ！靴舐めます？
subtitles.english: Oh, what is it? I'll do anything! Should I lick your shoes?

subtitles.original: え、嫌です！そんなんじゃない！そんなんじゃない！
subtitles.english: No, I don't want that! It's not like that! Not like that at all!

subtitles.original: 初めて言った...！
subtitles.english: That's the first time I've said that...!

subtitles.original: チョコ先生のその靴舐められるタイプですよ！
subtitles.english: Choco-sensei, I'm the type who'd have their shoes licked!

subtitles.original: なんなら！
subtitles.english: If anything!

subtitles.original: いや、もう、今日はもう、こんな素敵なね、
subtitles.english: But really, since I received such a wonderful...

subtitles.original: ものをプレゼントしていただいたので、何でもします。
subtitles.english: ...present today, I'll do anything.

subtitles.original: え、じゃあさ...
subtitles.english: In that case...

subtitles.original: はい。
subtitles.english: Yes.

subtitles.original: じゃあチョコ、せっかくだから、
subtitles.english: well, since we're here, Choco would...

subtitles.original: 巴様とお写真撮りたい！
subtitles.english: ...like to take a photo with Tomoe-sama!

subtitles.original: あ、嬉しい！
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm so happy!

subtitles.original: 可愛い！
subtitles.english: How cute!

subtitles.original: そんなん、いつでも撮りますよ！
subtitles.english: I'll take photos with you anytime!

subtitles.original: だって、こんなエッチな巴様、しかも3Dだなんて、
subtitles.english: I mean, such a sexy Tomoe-sama, and in 3D no less...

subtitles.original: なんなかないんだよ、みんな！
subtitles.english: ...it's a rare sight for everyone!

subtitles.original: そう、さっきの色気は凄いです。
subtitles.english: Yeah, your sex appeal earlier was amazing.

subtitles.original: 私、チョコ先生も、ここ、ここ、めっちゃ！
subtitles.english: I think Choco-sensei, here, and here, it's just... wow!

subtitles.original: もう練習してた時から、もう！
subtitles.english: Ever since we were practicing, I was like...!

subtitles.original: ここの、ああ...！みたいな、ああ...！みたいな。
subtitles.english: All those "Ah...!" and "Ah...!" moments here.

subtitles.original: すごい、こんなに、なんか本当に、
subtitles.english: It's amazing, like, really...

subtitles.original: チョコ先生って、もう、ずっと応援させていただいてますけど、
subtitles.english: I've been supporting you for a long time, Choco-sensei,

subtitles.original: 色っぽいのに、この可愛いお茶目なところもたくさんあって、本当に...
subtitles.english: but while you're sexy, you have so many cute, playful sides too.

subtitles.original: あ、写真でしたっけ？
subtitles.english: Oh, were we taking photos?

subtitles.original: もちろん、もちろん。撮りましょう！
subtitles.english: Of course, of course. Let's take them!

subtitles.original: お写真、お写真！
subtitles.english: Photos, photos!

subtitles.original: どんなポーズがみんな良いんだろう？
subtitles.english: What kind of pose would everyone like?

subtitles.original: え、うーん。
subtitles.english: Hmm, let's see.

subtitles.original: え、さ、あの、背中合わせでパチン！
subtitles.english: How about back-to-back, with a snap!

subtitles.original: 可愛い羽！
subtitles.english: What cute wings!

subtitles.original: 羽、可愛いねー。
subtitles.english: The wings are so cute.

subtitles.original: お羽！
subtitles.english: The wings!

subtitles.original: あ、結構身長差ありますね、私たち。
subtitles.english: Oh, we have quite a height difference.

subtitles.original: ね、巴様。
subtitles.english: Right, Tomoe-sama?

subtitles.original: うん。
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: お身長おいくつなんですか？
subtitles.english: How tall are you exactly?

subtitles.original: 私、ヒール込みで178なんですよ。
subtitles.english: I'm 178 cm including my heels.

subtitles.original: うわ！すごい！なんかいつもホロライブさんのライブとかだと大きいけど、
subtitles.english: Wow! Amazing! I'm usually among the taller ones in Hololive lives...

subtitles.original: もっとチョコ、めっちゃでかいからいつも！
subtitles.english: ...Choco is usually much bigger than everyone else!

subtitles.original: えー！なんかすごい！新鮮、新鮮！
subtitles.english: Whoa! This is amazing! So fresh, so fresh!

subtitles.original: 可愛い、ちっちゃいチョコ先生も可愛いですね、私と並ぶと。
subtitles.english: Cute, a small Choco-sensei is also cute when standing next to me.

subtitles.original: 嬉しい！じゃあ背中合わせで。
subtitles.english: I'm happy! Then, back-to-back.

subtitles.original: 背中合わせで、うんうん。
subtitles.english: Back-to-back, mhm.

subtitles.original: いい感じ！パチン！
subtitles.english: Looking good! Snap!

subtitles.original: あ、もう一回。パチン！
subtitles.english: Ah, one more time. Snap!

subtitles.original: ほらみんな、スクショタイムだぞー！
subtitles.english: Look everyone, it's screenshot time!

subtitles.original: なんだろう？パチン、パチンなんだ。
subtitles.english: What is it? Snap, snap.

subtitles.original: あの、アプリで触った時、巴様がパチンって言ってるやつ。
subtitles.english: You know, the thing Tomoe-sama says in the app, "Snap!"

subtitles.original: そうそう、あれ！あれ、すごく好き！
subtitles.english: Yes, that! I really love that!

subtitles.original: あ、ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Ah, thank you so much!

subtitles.original: 撮れた？
subtitles.english: Did you get it?

subtitles.original: 撮れた？
subtitles.english: Did you get it?

subtitles.original: じゃあ、そこから上、腕を上にやって、
subtitles.english: Then, from there, put your arms up and...

subtitles.original: セクシーポーズ！
subtitles.english: ...sexy pose!

subtitles.original: いい感じ！パシャ！
subtitles.english: Looking good! Click!

subtitles.original: おーいいの！
subtitles.english: Oh, that's great!

subtitles.original: すごーい！めちゃいいの！巨乳と巨乳が並んでます！
subtitles.english: Wow! It's so good! Two big-breasted beauties standing together!

subtitles.original: すごいことになってる、もう！ビッグバンですよ！
subtitles.english: This is incredible! It's a Big Bang!

subtitles.original: すごいですね！
subtitles.english: It really is amazing!

subtitles.original: わー、嬉しい！
subtitles.english: Wow, I'm so happy!

subtitles.original: わー、すごい！ありがとうございます、本当！
subtitles.english: Wow, incredible! Thank you so much, really!

subtitles.original: え、あとさ、あとさ、
subtitles.english: And also, and also,

subtitles.original: もうちょっとセクシーに！
subtitles.english: let's do something a bit more sexy!

subtitles.original: あ、いいよ！よいしょ。
subtitles.english: Oh, sure! There we go.

subtitles.original: 座っちゃおうかな！
subtitles.english: Maybe I'll sit down!

subtitles.original: あ、いいよ！よいしょ。じゃあ、
subtitles.english: Oh, sure! There. Then...

subtitles.original: クンクン（？）...うん、こんな？
subtitles.english: ...how's this?

subtitles.original: 背中合わせ、ピタッ。
subtitles.english: Back-to-back, pressed together.

subtitles.original: うん、ポーズ？
subtitles.english: Mhm, a pose?

subtitles.original: あー、すごい！
subtitles.english: Oh, wow!

subtitles.original: うわ、可愛い！なんか私の方が悪魔っぽいね、衣装的に。
subtitles.english: Whoa, cute! I look more like a devil because of my outfit.

subtitles.original: 確かに、可愛い天使、可愛い天使。
subtitles.english: True, a cute angel, a cute angel.

subtitles.original: え、めっちゃ可愛いです！
subtitles.english: Wow, you're so cute!

subtitles.original: うわー、めっちゃ絵になる！
subtitles.english: Whoa, it makes for such a great picture!

subtitles.original: 嬉しい！え、可愛いー！
subtitles.english: I'm so happy! Oh, so cute!

subtitles.original: ニコリ！
subtitles.english: Smile!

subtitles.original: わー、もう、本当、こんな並べる日が来るなんて、3Dで。嬉しいです。嬉しい！
subtitles.english: Wow, really, that a day like this would come where we stand side-by-side in 3D... I'm so happy. So happy!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。時間足りたかな？撮れたかな？
subtitles.english: Thank you so much. Was that enough time? Did you get the shots?

subtitles.original: ね。よいしょ。
subtitles.english: Right. Okay.

subtitles.original: あー、では、本当におめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Ah, well, congratulations once again!

subtitles.original: え、ありがとうございます！チョコ先生の誕生日なのに、
subtitles.english: Ah, thank you! Even though it's Choco-sensei's birthday,

subtitles.original: 私が、なんかこうとっておきの、忘れられないお誕生日、
subtitles.english: for me, it's such a special, unforgettable birthday...

subtitles.original: 私も今日、誕生日にしたいぐらいですね、もう！
subtitles.english: ...I feel like making today my birthday too!

subtitles.original: えー、本当に！
subtitles.english: Wow, really!

subtitles.original: 本当にありがとうございます！え、でも今日は歌って踊れて、すごい嬉しかった！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much! But really, being able to sing and dance today made me so happy!

subtitles.original: いや、こちらこそです、本当に。あの、頑張ってください。これからも応援しておりますので。
subtitles.english: No, the same here, really. Um, please do your best. I'll continue to support you from now on.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much!

subtitles.original: では、ありがとうございました！白雪巴でした。ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Well then, thank you very much! This was Shirayuki Tomoe. Thank you!

subtitles.original: え、巴様どこ行くの？
subtitles.english: Eh, Tomoe-sama, where are you going?

subtitles.original: え、あ、ん？何ですか？
subtitles.english: Eh, ah, what? What is it?

subtitles.original: いやいや、ちょっと、せっかくなんで最前列で見ようかと思って。
subtitles.english: No no, I just thought since I'm here, I'd watch from the front row.

subtitles.original: 待って、待って、待って！いや、もう、絶対！
subtitles.english: Wait, wait, wait! No way, definitely not!

subtitles.original: いや、もう、袖で見てましたけど、もう、前で見たいと思ってたんで、もう。
subtitles.english: I was watching from the wings, but I've been wanting to see it from the front.

subtitles.original: 巴様、チョコメイト達にそんな、もう興奮されちゃうから！
subtitles.english: Tomoe-sama, the Choco-mates will get too excited if you do that!

subtitles.original: あなたたち、前で見て失礼よ！
subtitles.english: You guys, excuse me while I watch from the front!

subtitles.original: 巴様、こっち！
subtitles.english: Tomoe-sama, over here!

subtitles.original: そう、ちょ、ちょ、蝶々になってるから！蝶々のフリしてるから！
subtitles.english: Yeah, I'm... I'm becoming a butterfly! I'm pretending to be a butterfly!

subtitles.original: 行ってきまーす！
subtitles.english: Off I go!

subtitles.original: はい、ということで。
subtitles.english: Alright then.
